title: 3 and Out - Watson Deal Reaction, Belichick Front Office Tree Props, Davante Over the Rodgers Drama
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Watson Deal Reaction, Belichick Front Office Tree Props, Davante Over the Rodgers Drama
description:
John reacts to the Browns trading for Deshaun Watson, why the massive guaranteed 5-year $230 million deal doesn't concern him from a cap standpoint, the legal risks, and almost certain suspension. He also looks at the deal from the Texans perspective, why the Belichick front office tree is crushing it while his coaching tree has been largely awful, and why Davante Adams leaving the Packers for Vegas looks bad for Aaron Rodgers.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
